mapper.insert: insert into tbl_permissions (permission_id, permission_name, permission_str, permission_type, path, img, order, father_node) values (#{permissionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{fatherNode,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update tbl_permissions set permission_name = #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission_str = #{permissionStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission_type = #{permissionType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order = #{order,jdbcType=TINYINT}, father_node = #{fatherNode,jdbcType=INTEGER} where permission_id = #{permissionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select permission_id, permission_name, permission_str, permission_type, path, img, order, father_node from tbl_permissions where permission_id = #{permissionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select permission_id, permission_name, permission_str, permission_type, path, img, order, father_node from tbl_permissions
